metadata.name: Tharsis. The first civilization.
metadata.description:
Hidden in the depths of space are mysteries and wonders, but it is there that the answer to humanity's biggest question lies - are we alone in the universe? Perhaps each civilization beyond our understanding is just a small part of the larger picture of the cosmos, reminding us that we are merely a tiny fragment in the infinite ocean of the universe.

DIGITAL NEOCUBISM. 2023.
